subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: After helping the Cardinals reach the Super Bowl, Todd Haley will coach the Kansas City Chiefs, joining a team that went a franchise-worst 2-14 under Herm Edwards.
snippet: After helping the Cardinals reach the Super Bowl, Todd Haley will coach the Kansas City Chiefs, joining a team that went a franchise-worst 2-14 under Herm Edwards.
